tool_description: This is an API that provides you with the electron configuration of any chemical element passed to it.
title: Chemical Configurations

api_list.name: predict_predit__post
main__get
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chemical-configurations.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chemical-configurations.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
